review: I had met the doctor and it was for open heart surgery related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time when we went. Medical tests were done in the hospital. I am recovering.

I had been to hospital and it was for normal heart checkup. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* Yesterday I was in hospital and I got discharged. Since last one month I am under his treatment. I am satisfied with the explanation given. I have already recommended doctor to my family and friends. There was no waiting time in the hospital. It was 5-10 minutes. Angiography was done. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor.
